updates.description: This update introduced new endpoints for portfolio management, allowing for more granular control and data access. It also improved the speed and reliability of data transfers.
updates.automation_value: The new API capabilities can be used to automate portfolio management tasks, reducing the need for manual data entry and saving time for users.
updates.business_impact: Improves portfolio management efficiency and data accuracy. Reduces manual work and enhances productivity.

updates.description: This suite provides a set of tools for automating common tasks in Wealthscape, such as account creation, transaction processing, and report generation.
updates.automation_value: By automating these tasks, users can save significant amounts of time and reduce the risk of errors.
updates.business_impact: Improves operational efficiency and reduces error rate. Enhances productivity and quality of work.

updates.description: This update allows Wealthscape to integrate directly with Salesforce, synchronizing data between the two systems in real-time.
updates.automation_value: This integration can automate data synchronization tasks, eliminating the need for manual data entry and ensuring that data is always up-to-date.
updates.business_impact: Improves data accuracy and timeliness. Reduces manual data entry and enhances productivity.

updates.description: This update introduced several new features designed to save time, including bulk transaction processing, automated report generation, and a new, more efficient user interface.
updates.automation_value: These features can reduce the amount of time users spend on routine tasks, allowing them to focus on more important work.
updates.business_impact: Improves operational efficiency and allows users to focus on strategic tasks. Enhances productivity and user experience.

updates.description: This update introduced new endpoints for risk management and compliance, as well as improvements to existing endpoints.
updates.automation_value: The new API capabilities can be used to automate risk management and compliance tasks, reducing the need for manual work and saving time for users.
updates.business_impact: Improves risk management and compliance efficiency. Reduces manual work and enhances productivity.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: Wealthscape API v2.5
   Release Date: November 15, 2023
   Description: This update introduced new endpoints for portfolio management, allowing for more granular control and data access. It also improved the speed and reliability of data transfers.
   Automation Value: The new API capabilities can be used to automate portfolio management tasks, reducing the need for manual data entry and saving time for users.

2. Update Name: Wealthscape Workflow Automation Suite
   Release Date: March 10, 2024
   Description: This suite provides a set of tools for automating common tasks in Wealthscape, such as account creation, transaction processing, and report generation.
   Automation Value: By automating these tasks, users can save significant amounts of time and reduce the risk of errors.

3. Update Name: Wealthscape Integration with Salesforce
   Release Date: July 30, 2024
   Description: This update allows Wealthscape to integrate directly with Salesforce, synchronizing data between the two systems in real-time.
   Automation Value: This integration can automate data synchronization tasks, eliminating the need for manual data entry and ensuring that data is always up-to-date.

4. Update Name: Wealthscape Time-Saving Features
   Release Date: January 5, 2025
   Description: This update introduced several new features designed to save time, including bulk transaction processing, automated report generation, and a new, more efficient user interface.
   Automation Value: These features can reduce the amount of time users spend on routine tasks, allowing them to focus on more important work.

5. Update Name: Wealthscape API v3.0
   Release Date: June 15, 2025
   Description: This update introduced new endpoints for risk management and compliance, as well as improvements to existing endpoints.
   Automation Value: The new API capabilities can be used to automate risk management and compliance tasks, reducing the need for manual work and saving time for users.
